actions.committee: Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to include each year of fellowship training in geriatric medicine or geriatric psychiatry as a year of obligated service under the National Health Corps Loan Repayment Program.

summary.text: Geriatricians Loan Forgiveness Act of 2002 - Amends the Public Health Services Act to include as a year of obligated service under the National Health Corps Loan Repayment Program each year of fellowship training in geriatric medicine or geriatric psychiatry that is required in order to obtain a certificate of added qualification in such fields.

titles.title: A bill to amend title III of the Public Health Service Act to include each year of fellowship training in geriatric medicine or geriatric psychiatry as a year of obligated service under the National Health Corps Loan Repayment Program.
